abstract: Lee Clow, an advertising executive who worked for decades with Apple on commercials like the iconic “1984” Super Bowl ad, has paid tribute to Steven P.  Jobs, who died on Wednesday.
snippet: Lee Clow, an advertising executive who worked for decades with Apple on commercials like the iconic “1984” Super Bowl ad, has paid tribute to Steven P.  Jobs, who died on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Lee Clow, who worked for decades with Steven P. Jobs and Apple at agencies that include Chiat/Day, TBWA/Chiat/Day and the TBWA/Media Arts Lab unit devoted to Apple, has paid tribute to Mr. Jobs, who died on Wednesday.

headline.main: Apple’s Longtime Ad Partner Reflects on Jobs
